title: Duo Partners Bronze/Silver
body: I believe im a reasonably skilled adc, currently in bronze 1 and trying to climb. Looking for a good support who has a wide champion pool and can adapt and play tanks, or squishies, based on good synergies. Also any good junglers who play tanky high gank junglers are good too. Add me if you fit any of these roles

replies.body: LuciFer accept my invites I'll carry you as thresh ðŸ˜‚
I'm in bronze 3 add meh Xdeathlolliepop ðŸ˜„    I play supp and Iv won all my supp games

Silver 1 support main here, Looking for a good ADC, they are damned hard to find. I also Jungle alot which might be right up your Alley, check out my match history.... oh no wait your eyes will bleed... haha.
